Jx.Formatter.Number

Extends: Jx.Formatter

This class formats numbers.  You can have it do the following

  • replace the decimal separator
  • use/add a thousands separator
  • change the precision (number of decimal places)
  • format negative numbers with parenthesis

Example

MooTools.lang Keys
  • ’formatter.number’.decimalSeparator
  • ’formatter.number’.thousandsSeparator

Summary
Jx.Formatter.NumberExtends: Jx.Formatter
Options
precisionThe number of decimal places to round to
useParensWhether negative numbers should be done with parenthesis
useThousandsWhether to use the thousands separator
Functions
formatFormats the provided number
changeTextThis method should be overridden by subclasses. 



Options



precision
The number of decimal places to round to



useParens
Whether negative numbers should be done with parenthesis



useThousands
Whether to use the thousands separator



Functions



format
format : function (value)
Formats the provided number
Parameters
valuethe raw number to format



changeText
changeText: function (lang)
This method should be overridden by subclasses.  It should be used to change any language specific default text that is used by the widget.
Parameters
langthe language being changed to or that had it’s data set of translations changed.
